Description:
Gemini 2.5 Pro is now generally available to GitHub Copilot customers. The latest Gemini model from Google is their most advanced model for complex tasks. It shows strong reasoning and…

The post [Gemini 2.5 Pro is generally available in Copilot](https://github.blog/changelog/2025-08-19-gemini-2-5-pro-is-generally-available-in-copilot) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
EnhancedContent:
Gemini 2.5 Pro is now generally available to GitHub Copilot customers. The latest Gemini model from Google is their most advanced model for complex tasks. It shows strong reasoning and code capabilities. It also leads on common coding, math, and science benchmarks.

### Get started today!

**Copilot Pro/Pro+ users**

You can start using the new Gemini 2.5 Pro model today through the model selectors in Copilot Chat (`Agent` , `Ask` , and `Edit` modes) in VS Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, Eclipse, github.com/copilot, and the GitHub mobile apps.

**Copilot Business or Enterprise users**

Copilot Business and Enterprise organization administrators will need to [grant access to Gemini 2.5 Pro in Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/using-gemini-pro-in-github-copilot#configuring-access) through a policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users will see the model in the model selector in Copilot Chat. You can confirm the model’s availability by checking individual Copilot settings and confirming the policy for Gemini 2.5 Pro is set to `enabled` .

### Share your feedback

Join the [Community discussion](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/156172) to share feedback and tips.

For additional information, [check out the docs on Gemini 2.5 Pro in Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/ai-models/using-gemini-in-github-copilot).

Learn more about the models available in Copilot in [our documentation on models](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/ai-models/choosing-the-right-ai-model-for-your-task) and [get started with Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/quickstart) today.
Author: Allison
Title: Gemini 2.5 Pro is generally available in Copilot
